person.persName: John R. Pirtle (Louisville, Kentucky, physician and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elmira K. Schwing Pirtle on March 10, 1852. Father of Laura and Alice Pirtle. Physician in Louisville in 1860. Surgeon in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) until December 19th, 1862.
